attributes.action: Give the UK media limited access to Covid wards to counter misinformation
attributes.additional_details:
People are visiting hospitals to film empty corridors and waiting areas with the aim of suggesting that the pandemic is a hoax or a lie, while also misrepresenting statistics to try and play down the seriousness of the crisis.

The best way to counter this misinformation is to allow people a window into the reality. Misinformation is causing huge stress to already worn out and emotionally exhausted staff - it is quite possible to report in a restricted, safe way protecting staff and patients.
attributes.background: There is a huge tide of misinformation around Covid at the moment where people are casting doubt on the official figures of cases, hospitalisations & deaths from Covid. This is most easily countered by allowing people to see the reality of the crisis by allowing journalists to report from red zones.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be an operational decision for hospitals, not the UK Government or Parliament.
